targets.query: SELECT sum("confs") FROM (SELECT last("conferences") AS "confs" FROM "jitsi_stats" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
SELECT max("x") FROM (SELECT last("largest_conference") AS "x" FROM "jitsi_stats" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
SELECT sum("x") FROM (SELECT last("participants") AS "x" FROM "jitsi_stats" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
SELECT sum("x") FROM (SELECT last("total_conferences_created") AS "x" FROM "jitsi_stats" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
SELECT sum("x") FROM (SELECT last("videostreams") AS "x" FROM "jitsi_stats" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
SELECT sum("x") FROM (SELECT last("videochannels") AS "x" FROM "jitsi_stats" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
SELECT last("usage_user") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$jitsi_host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("usage_user") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$jitsi_host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("total") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$jitsi_host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT last("total") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$jitsi_host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

list.definition: show tag values from "jitsi_stats" with key="host"
list.label: Vmeeting Servers
list.name: jitsi_host
